thread.section_title: Trustpilot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trustpilot | www.trustpilot.com
thread.title: Glenice Price

author: Glenice Price
title: Glenice Price
text:
HSBC BANK ,
The only credit card l have had that has offered me interest free to pay off an electrical item , which l have all most done over 2 years , l could of had up to 5 years to pay it off , l bought a lap top to do my surveys , so much appreciated on a free fee for life credit card and they offered me interest free , Thank you HSBC for showing you are so caring for your customers , Great to see a caring kind bank .Your offer was greatly appreciated by me .
Would recommend HSBC to every one .
